title: CourseExpo
desc: A collaborative VR/desktop learning environment built in Unity for the University of Washington.

title: FlashLearn
desc: A full-stack flash card app. Built with the MEAN stack. Utilizes a REST API and MongoDB.

title: CV Builder
desc: Built with React and Material UI. Create a resume with instant results. Utilized a CI/CD approach while developing.

title: Overflow
desc: An FPS free for all game made in Unity. Uses the UNET muliplayer solution. Players fight against eachother to earn the most points.

title: Animal Crossing Checklist
desc: A checklist to help users catch everything in Animal Crossing built with Vue.

title: Zombie Survival Game
desc: A wave based zombie survival game built in Unity. Features a point collection system that enables players to purchase new tools and upgrades, scaling difficulty, and leaderboards.

title: Backrooms Prototype
desc: A cooperative multiplayer puzzle game built in Unity with Photon networking and Dissonance voice chat
